A literary expert for the show.
A person who helps actors find work.

The central hub of the backstage team.

A member of the backstage crew.

The artistic leader of a production.

The creator of the story and characters.

Opposite of a comedy.

A play that uses songs and dance to tell a story.

A form of comedy and theater.
